computation.CUDA_ON: Determines if the code should be run on the GPU
computation.USE_FLOAT16: if set to True uses half-precision - not recommended
computation.nr_of_threads: set the maximal number of threads

configuration.load_settings_from_file: if set to True configuration settings are loaded from file
configuration.save_settings_to_file: if set to True configuration settings are saved to file
configuration.visualize: if set to true intermediate results are visualized

demo_examples.example_img_len: side length of image cube for example
demo_examples.use_real_images: if set to true using real and otherwise synthetic images
